function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential increase in energy consumption due to remote work policies","Impact":"Higher energy consumption could lead to increased environmental impact and costs","Mitigation":"Implement energy-saving measures and policies for remote work, such as energy-efficient equipment and lighting","Technologies":"Smart energy meters, occupancy sensors, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Occupants, policymakers, building administrators","Owner":"Policymakers, building administrators"},{"Description":"Changes in energy usage trends in the residential sector","Impact":"Unintended consequences on energy usage patterns and efficiency","Mitigation":"Careful evaluation of residential energy usage and implementation of tailored efficiency measures","Technologies":"Energy consumption tracking systems, energy-efficient appliances, smart meters","People":"Residential occupants, policymakers","Owner":"Policy makers, energy providers, building administrators"},{"Description":"Rebound effects from energy efficiency measures","Impact":"Unintended increase in energy consumption after energy efficiency measures are adopted","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring of energy usage, awareness campaigns on energy-saving practices","Technologies":"Energy consumption tracking systems, smart meters, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Occupants, policymakers, building administrators","Owner":"Building administrators, policymakers"}]}
